dialogue.action: restores his posture and control, turns around
dialogue.text: After that, the music changed to make me aware that I had to "go back" to where the session started, and the door did not appear again.

visual_elements.environment: therapy room solidifying back to normal

psychological_notes: The restoration of posture and control marks the ego's necessary return. The journey to dissolution must be followed by reintegration. The door's disappearance suggests the invitation was complete - what needed to be shown was shown.
philosophical_underpinning: Every spiritual journey requires return; integration happens in ordinary consciousness
therapeutic_direction: Honoring both the journey out and the journey back
